title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 2105.4 - Term of occupancy
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 2105.4 - Term of occupancy

State Regulations

No tenant shall be required to change his term of
occupancy; for example, a tenant on a monthly basis shall not be required to
change to a weekly basis, and a tenant on a weekly basis shall not be required
to change to a daily basis. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
2105.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
